document_data.mainbody:
Voonlar was a guidebook for the city of the name name, penned sometime before 1373 DR.
The guide of Voonlar was a short book that talked about the small city being located northeast of Shadowdale, between the roads that connected cities of YÃ»lash and Teshwave. The guide stated that Voonlar was a major trade competitor of the town of Shadowdale. The towns main trade was farming, with the most profitable farms located outdoes its walls. The citys history was over 600 years old, and despite that, there were not many notable events that took place in the town.
The authors warned travelers of Voonlars misleading status as an independent city, as it was, in truth, a puppet of the infamous Black Network. However, Voonlar had no Zhentarim agents within its walls apart from the towns leaders.
By the , copies of the Voonlar could be found in all major cities of the Moonsea region.
